text_block_list.text:
We were entering the second half of Summer Training Camp and Duramente 
was in the middle of preparing for her first race in the fall.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ——Fuu!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Wah, what a clean form……even on the sand. 
It seems like even at this she feels like an "Elite"

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I suppose she's got her mind on her first competition in the fall…… 
Either way, the results of her training will be a sight to see.

It seems like rumors had spread about "Duramente's 
Summer Training Camp" and now fans, reporters, and 
people from the academy had gathered. However——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Haa——! ……Fuuーーーー 
——One more.

She seemed very calm during training. She was able to 
concentrate without being distracted by the onlookers.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa……!
choice_data_list: OK, your lap running is consistent!

text_block_list.text:
Just like this, lately she's been able to concentrate 
without being affected by the pressure. It was a good sign.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Haa——!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ——……Alright.
choice_data_list: Looking good. We'll time it next
Looking good. We'll time it next

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Then, from the line over there——

text_block_list.name: Spectating Fan
text_block_list.text: Ohh! They're going to take Duramente's time!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Huuー……
choice_data_list: Dura! Are you ready?
Dura! Are you ready?

text_block_list.name: Spectating Fan
text_block_list.text:
I'll bet she can run on sand like it's no 
different than turf! After all, it's Duramente——!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: (……Focus. Look only at the goal where Trainer is)

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Suuー……Haaaaーー…… 
……——
choice_data_list: Ready……Start!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Haaaa……!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text:
Uwaah, amazing acceleration! 
This is on sand right!? No way, so fast……——
choice_data_list: Goal!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …… Haa, haa……Huu.
choice_data_list: Awesome! Your best time!
Awesome! Your best time!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
——! 
……I see. Then, one more.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
——Ten! 
Time?

That's 0.2 seconds off her best time. 
I tell her that her time is pretty consistent.
choice_data_list: Let's call it a day, good work!
Let's call it a day, good work!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. 
……After this I have an interview.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
It'll be together with my father at a nearby coffee 
shop at 5PM. In 30 minutes……Trainer, can you make it?

Since it was together with her father, I wondered 
if it involved some family business. I remember being 
told that I didn't need to worry about it, but——
choice_data_list: Is it okay to tag along?
Is it okay to tag along?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Eh?
choice_data_list: Huh? It's family-related right?
Huh? It's family-related right?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
It was an offer made through our family, 
so you don't need to worry about it.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
(——That's right. It was offered through 
our family, so Trainer is unrelated……——)

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: (Since when……? Since when did I start……?)
choice_data_list: ……Something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
No……——Well, you aren't involved. 
If you're busy, you don't need to accompany me.
choice_data_list: Would I be intruding……?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
No, you wouldn't be. Rather—— 
…………Sorry. I just assumed you would be accompanying me.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: At some point……I just assumed that would be normal——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Thinking back on it…… 
That time with the new product reveal.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
And that time when I was feeling nervous at the gym and 
you supported me. And during the earlier training too——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……I've gotten used to that sense of 
security that having you nearby brings.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
That's why, without thinking I…… And I'm now realizing 
that I've been relying on you for a lot. Sorry——
choice_data_list: If that's how you feel, I'll go with you
If that's how you feel, I'll go with you

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……Eh
choice_data_list: If that helps you stay calm, even more so
If that helps you stay calm, even more so

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……Then, I'd like you to come with me.
The interview that followed was very relaxed and went smoothly——
It was completely dark by the time it was over.

She must be tired after the training and interview. 
I suggested we take a break here.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
choice_data_list: The stars are wonderful, aren't they?
The stars are wonderful, aren't they?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Yeah. ——……

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
(It's really calming…… More than any quiet 
place, or time alone, more than anything……)

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
(Being near this person gives me peace of mind. 
……It makes me stronger)

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …………you really are a mysterious person.
